song.title: Hosanna (I see the King of Glory)
song.lyrics:
[1] .G I see the King of glory .Em Coming on the clouds with fire || . Am The whole earth shakes . D The whole earth shakes
[2] I see His love and mercy Washing over all our sin || The people sing The people sing
[C] . G C D Em Hosanna, Hosanna . C Em D/F# Hosanna in the Highest || . G C D Em Hosanna, Hosanna .C D Em Hosanna in the Highest ---
[3] I see a generation Rising up to take their place || With selfless faith, with selfless faith
[4] I see a near revival Staring as we pray and seek || We're on our knees, we're on our knees
[Instrumental] .Em G Am7 Bm7
[B] .C D Heal my heart and make it clean .G Em Open up my eyes to the things unseen .C D Em Show me how to love like You have loved me || .C D Break my heart for what breaks Yours .G Em Everything I am for Your Kingdom's cause .C D C As I walk from earth into eternity
